mdRecord.dcterms:title: Valentine Day Love Letter
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A lovely ornate paper Valentine's Day Love Letter to Miss Maud Howard, Floyd C.H. Va. postmarked 1882. The valentine is pink with white lace cutout creating a frame with doors that open to a painting of a ladies portrait. Above the doors is a little boy with a net and a blue flower, and below is a bouquet of flowers that says "Hope." Inside is a brightly colored border encircling the message: Accept my Love, Thou art my life, my love, my heart, The very eyes of me, And hast command of every part, To live and die for thee.
